c-0: ^Garry Faust is a genius philanthropist of our time! Who wouldn’t know about him?
^He started off small in his basement making games until his stint into trading card games exploded! Manic Machinations took the world by storm and became a worldwide hit.
^He made a company, put in some smart investments, and his career only grew from there!
^Since then he’s been expanding to fields outside of entertainment. Politics, fine arts, science, and so much more.
^It sounds like you’ve done your research, but how do you <i>know Garry
